+= Migration Guide from release 1.8.0 to release 1.9.0 
+
+== AcknowledgmentAllowed field in business configuration 
+
+
+In the process state definition the acknowledgmentAllowed field in no more a boolean type and can now assume one of the following values:
+
+- "Never": acknowledgement not allowed (default value)
+
+- "Always": acknowledgement allowed
+
+- "OnlyWhenResponseDisabledForUser": acknowledgement allowed only when the response is disabled for the user
+

timeline.bodyText: put value to OnlyWhenResponseDisabledForUser for this use case with response card
